ygData.subject: Re: A few questions on double jeopardy l
ygData.msgSnippet: one of the things i ve noticed, is when going thru a hell lvl or even just getting ready to lvl at all, things get a bit harder, spells fizzle more, hits don t
ygData.messageBody:
one of the things i've noticed, is when going
thru a hell lvl or even just getting ready to lvl at
all, things get a bit harder, spells fizzle more, hits
don't connect as much or as hard. it's like a rite of
passage kinda thing. once into a new lvl, things kinda go
back to normal, but you can die a lot faster until you
get your insurance bubble. <br>as a 29 enchanter from
sol ro server, i know this very well, hehe.<br>just
keep pluggin away at things and you'll be fine<br>see
you all in norrath<br>siljerr mindweaver, 29
enchanter, mithril daggers, solusek ro.
